allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Supabase authentication with daily download limits

- Add AuthGate component for login/signup flow
- Track resume downloads per user \(5 free per day\)
- Auto-reset download count every 24 hours
- Show daily limit message when limit reached
- Add loading states and visual feedback to download buttons
- Cover letter download is optional but counts toward limit
- Integrate Supabase client with environment variables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
